content:
<rule id="3rd-party-30600" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <or>
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="aliyun-sdk-oss" groupId="com.aliyun.oss"/>
                    </project>                    
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="aliyun-sdk-oss-private" groupId="com.aliyun.oss"/>
                    </project>
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="aliyun-sdk-oss-console" groupId="com.aliyun.oss"/>
                    </project>
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="hadoop-aliyun" groupId="com.aliyun.oss"/>
                    </project>
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="kafka-connect-oss" groupId="com.aliyun.oss"/>
                    </project>
                </or>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="Embedded framework - Cloud OSS">
                    <description>The application embeds the Cloud OSS framework.</description>
                </classification>
                <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL">Cloud OSS</technology-tag>
            </perform>
        </rule>
